name: 陳金聖
objective: 電腦運動控制課程包含下列課題：(1) 命令產生器設計， (2)運動本體與回授系統介紹， (3)基礎迴授控制器設計， (4)前饋控制器設計， (5)估測器設計，(6)多軸路徑控制， (7) 案例探討 -- 半導體與LCD設備。學生從這門課程中可學到如何利用 PC_based 控制器去完成一套運動控制系統。
schedule:
Week 01, 2/23: Introduction
Week 02, 3/01: Real-Time control system
Week 03, 3/8: Real-Time control system
Week 04, 3/15: Path planning and trajectory generation
Week 05, 3/22: Path planning and trajectory generation
Week 06, 3/29: Introduction of motion control plant & feedback system
Week 07, 4/05: Introduction of motion control plant & feedback system
Week 08, 4/12: Overview of discrete control
Week 09, 4/19: Feedback control loop design
Week 10, 4/26: Feedback control loop design
Week 11, 5/03: Feedforward control loop design
Week 12, 5/10: Feedforward control loop design
Week 13, 5/17: Midle project presentation
Week 14, 5/24: Observer Design
Week 15, 5/31: Observer Design and disturbance compensation
Week 16, 6/07: Multi-axis contouring control
Week 17, 6/14: Case study
Week 18, 6/21: Final project presentation
materials:
Background Knowledge:
1. a or b (a. Automatic Control, Digital Signal processing,  b. Digital Control),
2. Matlab/ Simulink: simulation tool,
3. C/C++: implementation tool.
Textbook：
1. Handout edited by myself,
2. Reference paper.
Reference：
1. Chuck Raskin, “Designing With Motion Handbook: Design-Integration-Software Tips and Techniques”, Newnes; 5th edition,  1997.
2. Y. Date, “Servo Motor and Motion Control Using Digital Signal Processors”, Prentice Hall, Englewood Cliffs, NJ, 1990
3. Hamid A. Toliyat, Steven Campbell, “DSP-Based Electromechanical Motion Control”, CRC Press, 2003.
4. ”Handbook of AC Servo Systems”, from www.motiononline.com supported by Automation Intelligence, Inc., Issued: 18/Jun/01
5. 楊憲東，〝精密機械控制原理與模擬〞，全華圖書
6. 施慶隆、李文猶，〝機電整合控制—多軸運動設計與應用〞，全華圖書
